title: Kennen's Ultimate Bug 6.11

embed.description: Watch StormLgnd's League of Legends video: Kennen's Ultimate Bug - Plays.tv

body: Eventually even the little bit of lightning wasn't visible to my entire team and every teamfight we had no idea if Kennen ulted or not until after we checked our death recaps. I lost a ranked game mostly because of this. I've also heard of invisible Leona ults and Ekko's W. Pls fix !

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report! We're currently running compatability tests to see if this is something that's being caused by certain graphics cards (as this doens't happen 100% of the time), or if it's an issue on our end with the particle itself.

Ayeee my favorite Rioter! Thanks for the fast reply and I appreciate you guys looking into this. 

P.S. I hope your surgeries are going well and your recovery is as fast as can be :D (I follow your Twit, haha)

Of course! We're still running compat (takes a bit because we're running a ton of different configurations ;_;)

Aww, thank you! ^-^ So far so good, haha. Just a bit sore. I have one other surgery (same kind of deal) in a few weeks. It wasn't nearly as bad as I thought it would be!
